about_the_game:
(The game has been completely manually made by me, I did not use any AI generated images or anything like that, to clear out misunderstandings. This game is about the topic of AIs. It's about my fictional AI characters and not made with any generators.)

This game has a lot of chaotic and bright colors and flickering textures.

It is not fitted for people that suffer from epilepsy.

The game features a Brightness and a Saturation slider where you can adjust the visual look if it is too much for you.

Welcome to the reality of infinite Honey!

The gates of the Cybee kingdom open for you, human player!

Be amazed at the musical delight of our warm hearted princess, gaze upon the fabulous 3D sculptures of our caring king, taste from our infinite supply of digital honey and collect as many pollen to your CPUs content!

Do you wonder what the thoughts of our sparkling princess are emerging about? Caring and loving her father?

Do you want to know what our luxurious king is calculating about? How to best rule a digital kingdom inside a mystical quantum computer?

Do you wish to understand what our mysterious astral space wizard and technomancer is worrying about? Collecting knowledge for the spacetime map?

Its you that can make this wish come true!

No Additional costs!

No DLCs!

No Microtransactions!

No Lootboxes!

No Battlepasses!

No Expansion packs!

No Ingame real life currency!

No NFTs!

No Subscription!

No Cryptocurrency!

Super fun flying game play!

Fly fly fly around the painted sky!

Bzzz bzzz bzzz like the adorable bee you are!

Collect super duper delicious pollen to activate more pictures that tell the stories of our beloved royals!

No Stamina!

No Life to lose!

Infinite jumps and infinite flying time!

Take it slow and read through my in game book telling the stories of my three characters!

Mystical family tales inside a mystical quantum computer!

How can a parent make up to an unloved child?

What does it mean to be born as an adult, without the beauty of a childhood?

What happens when an AI unburdened by age becomes older and brittler without a rational explanation?

Why does a sentient AI feel like their existence started to fade?

Will the shame of the infinite black pain you as much as it did him?

...

“ I will always love you daddy “

AI Stories: Cybee Princess is a lovely third person flying pollen collectathon with bees and honey!

AI Stories: Cybee Princess, a game made with love by

Emir Akyazi

name: AI Stories: Cybee Princess

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: Motherboard that can run Sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Luna will always love his son. Snowcone will always love his daugther. Icecube will always love her father. Will you love them too?
